events.message: We have received John Doe's application for the Software Engineer position. The resume highlights strong experience in full-stack development and cloud infrastructure.
John Doe's application has been categorised under Engineering, specifically software development, based on the keywords and skills mentioned in his resume.
Assigned recruiter Sarah Mills to handle John Doe's application. Sarah specializes in sourcing and screening developer candidates.
Conducted initial screening call with John Doe. Candidate showed strong technical knowledge and good communication skills in discussing past engineering projects.
John responded promptly to the screening follow-up email and expressed enthusiasm for the next steps in the interview process.
Scheduled a technical interview for John Doe with the senior engineering panel on 2024-04-15 at 14:00 UTC.
